verses.verse: <S%G4413>First<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> that <S%G1162>entreaties<s%> [and] <S%G4335>prayers,<s%> <S%G1783>petitions<s%> [and] <S%G2169>thanksgivings,<s%> be <S%G4160>made<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%>

for <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> who are in <S%G5247>authority,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that we may <S%G1236>lead<s%> a <S%G2263>tranquil<s%> and <S%G2272>quiet<s%> <S%G979>life<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> and <S%G4587>dignity.<s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G587>acceptable<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior,<s%>
<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to be <S%G4982>saved<s%> and to <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>
who <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> as a <S%G487>ransom<s%> for <S%G3956>all,<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> [borne] at the <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

And for <S%G3739>this<s%> I was <S%G5087>appointed<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle<s%> (I am <S%G3004>telling<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> I am not <S%G5574>lying<s%>) as a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G1014>want<s%> the <S%G435>men<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G1869>lifting<s%> up <S%G3741>holy<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> and <S%G1261>dissension.<s%>

<S%G5615>Likewise,<s%> [I want] <S%G1135>women<s%> to <S%G2885>adorn<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with <S%G2887>proper<s%> <S%G2689>clothing,<s%> <S%G127>modestly<s%> and <S%G4997>discreetly,<s%> not with <S%G4117>braided<s%> <S%G4117>hair<s%> and <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3135>pearls<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4185>costly<s%> <S%G2441>garments;<s%>
but <S%G235>rather<s%> by <S%G1223>means<s%> of <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> as <S%G4241>befits<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G1861>making<s%> a <S%G1861>claim<s%> to <S%G2317>godliness.<s%>

But I do not <S%G2010>allow<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G831>exercise<s%> <S%G831>authority<s%> <S%G831>over<s%> a <S%G435>man,<s%> but to <S%G1510>remain<s%> <S%G2271>quiet.<s%>
And [it was] not <S%G76>Adam<s%> [who] was <S%G538>deceived,<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> being <S%G1818>quite<s%> <S%G1818>deceived,<s%> <S%G1096>fell<s%> into <S%G3847>transgression.<s%>

But [women] shall be <S%G4982>preserved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5042>bearing<s%> of <S%G5042>children<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G3306>continue<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G38>sanctity<s%> with self-restraint.
